alerts.name: cpu overloaded
alerts.condition: if cpu-0/cpu-idle.value < '3' for 5 min then escalate to 'critical'

alerts.name: high network rx activity
alerts.condition: if interface/if_octets-eth0.rx > '50000000' for 30 min then escalate to 'critical'

alerts.name: high network tx activity
alerts.condition: if interface/if_octets-eth0.tx > '50000000' for 10 min then escalate to 'critical'

alerts.name: instance not responding
alerts.condition: if cpu-0/cpu-idle.value == 'NaN' for 5 min then escalate to 'critical'

alerts.name: instance stranded
alerts.condition: if RS/server-failure.state == 'stranded' for 1 min then escalate to 'critical'

alerts.name: instance terminated
alerts.condition: if RS/server.state == 'terminated' for 1 min then escalate to 'critical'

alerts.name: low space in mnt partition
alerts.condition: if df/df-mnt.free < '10000000000' for 5 min then escalate to 'critical'

alerts.name: low space in root partition
alerts.condition: if df/df-root.free < '1000000000' for 5 min then escalate to 'critical'

alerts.name: low swap space
alerts.condition: if swap/swap-free.value < '100000000' for 5 min then escalate to 'critical'

alerts.name: memory low
alerts.condition: if memory/memory-free.value < '100' for 1 min then escalate to 'critical'

alerts.name: out of memory
alerts.condition: if memory/memory-free.value == '0' for 1 min then escalate to 'critical'
